title: Mojang办公室大冒险
author: DJXGAME
txt_content:
很好奇Mojang的办公室是什么样子吗( ⊙ o ⊙ )？看了这个视频就知道了~
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNTQwNDYwMjgw.html

replies.author: dseqe
replies.txt_content: 我还以为是他家

replies.author: Emerson
replies.txt_content: 哇。。。有视频耶..

replies.author: Sakura灬zero
replies.txt_content: 蛮有趣的说，去看看

replies.author: Evan丶桑
replies.txt_content: 完全不好奇啊~

replies.author: moonshell
replies.txt_content: 發現石鎬一個.........
好厉害的样子=-=

replies.author: mclauncher
replies.txt_content: 办公室而已

replies.author: youyou
replies.txt_content: 很想在这里工作什么的说~

replies.author: sweetapple
replies.txt_content: 好像家。。反倒不像一个公司的工作场所。。好放松啊他们

replies.author: suibiandehao
replies.txt_content: 看起来不错呀

replies.author: Aikawastep
replies.txt_content:
YOOO,火速围观
！

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 路邊電燈泡 于 2013-4-9 23:27 编辑 

表示未來如果可能假設應該有能力的話會優先考慮進入這裡工作=.=

replies.author: city49
replies.txt_content: It`s a real game bar with a full time kitchen.

replies.author: Cpt.Dunn
replies.txt_content: 支持一下~之前介绍玩具的时候看到过了……

replies.author: yuxuanchiadm
replies.txt_content: Jeb键盘大亮

replies.author: a20001017
replies.txt_content: 墙上有苦力怕，办公室不保

replies.author: nodaleaf
replies.txt_content: 好像看到中国外包画。

replies.author: l1227960519
replies.txt_content: 好欢乐，好休闲

replies.author: stilke
replies.txt_content: 长见识了啦！

replies.author: 无敌JJ怪
replies.txt_content: 这特么是家还是办公室?

replies.author: RB君
replies.txt_content: QWQ，哇~好棒的工作室，长大后也想要有个工作室
我表示我只喜欢MC不在乎他是什么办公室——

replies.author: wa1019196051
replies.txt_content: 这要是我家就好了

replies.author: ★killer_407★
replies.txt_content: 工作好轻松- -

replies.author: IceFreeze
replies.txt_content:
诶..上学后好忙...根本没时间来论坛了QAQ
办公室...好大...好宽敞...
不愧老师说瑞典那里风景格调不错...

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content:
Mojang的企业模式是全世界值得学习的
里面的东西好复古。。

replies.author: a919298641
replies.txt_content: 冰箱里东西真少a.a

replies.author: wwwyuannet
replies.txt_content: 等下！我怎么听到有人玩SMB？（超级食肉男孩）

replies.author: 迅雷
replies.txt_content: 他们在这住么...还有厨房...
D姐姐头像怎么生成的？我也要撒~

replies.author: 某高宗
replies.txt_content: 待遇怎么那么好！

replies.author: abyyfy
replies.txt_content: 什么时候在国内也能见到这样的办公室...

replies.author: 公猫
replies.txt_content: 欧玛，这办公室好大。

replies.author: 上官绝洛
replies.txt_content: 手机看不到视频啊……
为神马我并没有发现视频？！我卡了？？
我只能听懂hellow 小学生的英语水平伤不起啊

replies.author: Forever坏
replies.txt_content: 我要那个爬行者的玩偶！！！

replies.author: ★酷灬小贤丿
replies.txt_content: 坑爹啊！话说是内部人员做的？

replies.author: qq1575550349
replies.txt_content: 版主你太帅了！！真希望我可以去……

replies.author: liyou
replies.txt_content:
英语听不懂
有木有？
羡慕嫉妒狠啊

replies.author: wilhelm
replies.txt_content: 环境真不错啊~还有那个石镐是开瓶器吗？？？超喜欢

replies.txt_content: 挖！我以后也要去这种办公室，话说他们好轻松，下午都可以玩电脑

replies.txt_content: 好喜欢这种风格一致的Office,画手我只认得jeb
